attributes.action: Soverign rings being used as weapons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have started this petition to stop people using soverign rings not as a jewellery accessory but as knuckle dusters. More people are falling victim to violent assaults from thugs because of the confidence they get from walking around with what might as well be a metal fist.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
